section.title: Description
section.para: Instead of using our Mobicents Default Application Router, any SIP Servlets 1.1 compliant Application Router can be used such as the DFC Application Router from ECharts

section.title: Tomcat
section.para: Just drop the dfcar.jar from the ECharts distribution package in TOMCAT_HOME/lib directory and remove the Mobicents Default Application Router located in TOMCAT_HOME/lib/sip-servlets-application-router-*.jar

section.title: JBoss 4.2.x
section.para: Just drop the dfcar.jar from the ECharts distribution package in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jboss-web.deployer directory and remove the Mobicents Default Application Router located in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jboss-web.deployer/sip-servlets-application-router-*.jar

section.title: JBoss 5.1.x
section.para: Just drop the dfcar.jar from the ECharts distribution package in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jbossweb.sar/ directory and remove Mobicents Default Application Router located in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jbossweb.sar/sip-servlets-application-router-*.jar
